variations.description: Summons a magic barrier to reduce damage taken by all allies by 12% and heals them for 24% of Tama's ATK every second for 10s.
Summons a magic barrier to reduce damage taken by all allies by 14% and heals them for 28% of Tama's ATK every second for 10s.
Summons a magic barrier to reduce damage taken by all allies by 16% and heals them for 32% of Tama's ATK every second for 10s.
Summons a magic barrier to reduce damage taken by all allies by 18% and heals them for 36% of Tama's ATK every second for 10s.
Summons a magic barrier to reduce damage taken by all allies by 20% and heals them for 40% of Tama's ATK every second for 10s.
Heals the ally in the front row for 180% of Tama's ATK and increases their damage or healing effect of next active skill by 60%.
Heals the ally in the front row for 210% of Tama's ATK and increases their damage or healing effect of next active skill by 70%.
Heals the ally in the front row for 240% of Tama's ATK and increases their damage or healing effect of next active skill by 80%.
Heals the ally in the front row for 270% of Tama's ATK and increases their damage or healing effect of next active skill by 90%.
Heals the ally in the front row for 300% of Tama's ATK and increases their damage or healing effect of next active skill by 100%.
Heals an ally for 50% of ATK when attacking.
Heals all allies for 50% of ATK when attacking.
